column5: Is there a duty on boat gas in extra tanks? If so how much?
Is there a duty on boat gas in extra tanks? If so how much?

[font color=green size=3][b]They generally don't bother you with a "reasonable" amount of boat gas. How much is reasonable? I've never been bothered, with as much as 5 6 gal tanks. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby

I called customs/border patrol on this as well. As long as it is considered reasonable, they cannot charge duty. If you plan on burning 10 gallons a day, then figure that in. Now if you had a 6hp motor and planned on running 10 gallons a day, they might raise an eyebrow at that.. Steve
